meta.title: Dreaming of You
meta.body:
Dreaming of You is a system for tapping into your computer's dreams.
> There are three parts to this program. The first is a screen saver that visualizes screenshots that it downloads from a web server. The second is a program that periodically takes screenshots of your computer and uploads them to the server. The third part is a preference widget that displays information about the program and allows you to toggle private mode, which temporarily disables taking screenshots.
